titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow section 1031 treatment for exchanges involving certain mutual ditch, reservoir, or irrigation company stock.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E375)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
2/16/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow tax-free exchanges of shares in certain mutual ditch, reservoir, or irrigation companies.
